EmailTemplate.description: Email Notification for Brand Security Infringement

EmailTemplate.subject: Brand Security Infringement Notification: {!EUR_CRM_Brand_Security_Infringement__c.EUR_CRM_Brand_Quality__c}

Hi {!User.Name},
A new Brand Security Infringement Record was created!
To view the details, click this link -: {!EUR_CRM_Brand_Security_Infringement__c.Link}.
Thank You.
